Geilo.title: Geilo
Geilo.byline: Geilo is a small town and ski resort in upper Hallingdal at the edge of Hardangervidda.

Geiranger.title: Geiranger
Geiranger.byline: Geiranger and Hellesylt are villages in Møre og Romsdal.

Geisenheim.title: Geisenheim
Geisenheim.byline: Geisenheim is a town in the Rheingau of Hesse, Germany.
